713993f-a.text:
59th Street, north side, east from First Avenue, with the Queensborough Bridge in the background.
September 20, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

713992f-a.text:
59th Street, west from First Avenue. In the background are the hotels Delmonico and Sherry-Netherland, in a direct line with the camera, so that they seem to be one building, and to the
left, the Hotel Pierre.
March S, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
